Message.Name: rats
Message.Words: I am Ratsputin! _I am looking for the guy _who killed my parents... _Cecil!

Message.Name: me too
Message.Words: Cecil!!!! _I hate that jerk! _He kicked me off of his team _because I wasn't good enough...

Message.Name: cont
Message.Words: He is not in this town, _but I can tag along and help _you find him!
